TEST03
  For an order 4 tetrahedron,
  PHYSICAL_TO_REFERENCE_TET4 maps a physical point to
    a reference point.
  REFERENCE_TO_PHYSICAL_TET4 maps a reference point to
    a physical point.

    ( R       S       T ) ==> ( X       Y       Z ) ==> ( R2      S2      T2 )

    0.6530    0.0192    0.0802    1.6329    2.1413    3.5562    0.6530    0.0192    0.0802

FEM3D_PACK_PRB:
  Normal end of execution.
